      • addObserverFor

        public static void addObserverFor(String identifier,
                                  LanguageSelection.OnLanguageChangeListener onLanguageChangeListener)
        Adds an Listener to the given identifier. The Listener is called, each time the language changed and on attach.
        Parameters:
        identifier - the identifier
        onLanguageChangeListener - the listener for this identifier
